description:
Ready to take your data manipulation skills to the next level? Are you feeling saturated with the limits of EXCEL?

Want to truly learn an R COURSE which shows you why R is the next best thing in data manipulation world?

This course is for you!

Let's get introduced to DPLYR R PACKAGE Video training, sample datasets used with considering the beginners of R in mind, an engaging exercise which is both fun and also gives you a taste for DPLYR R Package and its powerful commands that make your life easier than ever!

Each module is independent so you can start learning from wherever you see fit. The more you learn the better you will get. However, you can stop at any time you will still have a strong set of skills to take with you.

BONUS: This course will be updated with brand new sections as Hadley Wicham releases new versions ofDPLYR PACKAGE in the future. So when you enroll - you enroll for life!

This is just the beginning! I'm going to create advanced data manipulation course using dplyr package where we will work with real datasets and complex real-world problems. Till then, LET'S LEARN THE BASICS OF DPLYR as my first course with many more R courses releasing in future!
title: DPLYR R Package: Introductory R Course on Data Analysis in R
